name: Time Agent: Protect the VIP
description:
Controls

- Display Controls - ESC (twice)
- Walk: WASD
- Interact: E
- Equip/Unequip weapon: Q
- Check time & notes: TAB
- Inspect Item: Hold Mouse1
- Rotate Item: Hold Mouse2 (while inspecting)
- Flashlight: F
- Faster time: .
- Slower time: ,
- Normal time: M
